REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0356 reute b f BC-FEDERAL-REALTY-ISSUES 04-08 0106

TEXT.TITLE: FEDERAL REALTY ISSUES 75 MLN DLR CONVERTIBLE BOND
TEXT.BODY: Federal Realty Investment Trust is issuing a 75 mln dlr convertible eurobond due April 30, 2002 paying an indicated coupon of 5-1/4 to 5-1/2 pct and priced at par, lead manager Salomon Brothers International said. The issue has a put option after seven years which will be priced to give the investor a yield in line with current seven year U.S. Treasury bond. Final terms will be fixed on April 9. The selling concession is 1-1/2 pct while management and underwriting each pay 1/2 pct. The issue is available in denominations of 1,000 and 10,000 dlrs. REUTER
